channel.title: Eulers Village Looking for Members/Merging Opportunity
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Eulers Village Looking for Members/Merging Opportunity" - Because Math is Fun

item.title: Re: Eulers Village Looking for Members/Merging Opportunity
item.content:encoded:
Eulers has become Erdos village in the Immortal Realm. We're still looking for members, and we're still good at math!

129 upgrades and the membership fluctuates in the high 40's. Keep your eyes peeled for an opening and send an application!

If you have any questions, try looking up the village in-game.

item.title: Eulers Village Looking for Members/Merging Opportunity
item.content:encoded:
Eulers Village is looking to merge with a smaller village of about 15-20 peopleâ€¦ we currently have 32 active players and 48 upgrades, including some random kaiju upgrades. Please PM me to negotiate.

Otherwise, anyone and everyone else is welcome to apply to join =) We're fun and we're good at math! xD Eulers Village welcomes both old and new players.
